text: Me Kenanɨn nguazim 40plan aruebar moga a getia gara anesavsuigha, uamategha Kadesɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ghu. Kades, a Paranɨn gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn iti. Egha me Moses, ko Aron ko Israelian gumazamiziba, bizir me ganizibar me geghari. Egha temer ovɨzir kaba men akakagha ghaze, ia kagh temer ovɨzir kabar gan.
